high_descs: Turn around, move forward a few feet, turn right to face the book on the dining table.
Pick up the book on the table.
Bring the book forward past the table, to the front of the couch, be sure to turn around to face the couch.
Put the book on the couch.
anns.task_desc: Move a book from the dining table to the couch.

high_descs: Turn around and face the table on the right.
Pick up the book toward the right side.
Carry the book and turn to the right and then left to go past the couch. Turn left and then face the couch on the left.
Place the book on the couch, in the middle.
anns.task_desc: Move a book from table to couch.

high_descs: Turn around and face the table on the right.
Pick up the book from the right side of the table.
Carry the book and turn to the right and left around the table. Move forward to turn left after the couch. Face the couch on the left.
Place the book on the couch, in the middle.
anns.task_desc: Move a book to a couch.
